info.title: Sui API
info.description: The SUI Blockchain API is used to retrieve SUI Blockchain data. In order to execute queries you need to get API Key and use it in header 'x-api-key'. However, before that you need to sign up on the explorer or company website. If an account is created on the website https://staketab.com/ or https://suiscan.xyz/, the user will be granted the ROLE_USER role. After that you may fetch API KEY.

get.description: Get a list of all accounts on the Sui Network.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method: from the lowest element to the highest (ASC) or from the highest element to the lowest (DESC).

get.description: Get a list of all packages on the Sui Network. Packages are smart contracts on Sui that execute custom logic.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method: from the lowest element to the highest (ASC) or from the highest element to the lowest (DESC).

parameters.name: searchStr
parameters.description: Enter part or full package id (hash).

parameters.name: isListedInDirectory
parameters.description: Flag showing that the queried package is listed in the Suiscan Directory.

schema.description: Flag showing that the queried package is listed in the Suiscan Directory.

parameters.name: isVerifiedSources
parameters.description: Flag showing that the queried package is verified, and the publisher provided its source code.

schema.description: Flag showing that the source code of the queried package is verified

get.description: Get the total number of all packages on the Sui Network.
Get package details by id.
Get details of transaction blocks in a raw JSON format by hash.

parameters.name: digest
parameters.description: Digest is an equivalent to a hash on the Sui Network.

schema.description: Digest is an equivalent to a hash on the Sui Network.

get.description: Get a chart showing staking parameters for the selected period, e.g. minimum staking amount, grace period, validator set, etc.
Get the current throughput - the number of transactions executed per second - on the Sui Network.
Get the total number of transaction blocks on the Sui Network. Transaction blocks are added in checkpoints and contain single transactions that execute atomic operations.
Get the total number of transactions on the Sui Network. Transactions are atomic units contained in transaction blocks that execute atomic operations.
Get the total number of entities of the queried type.

Get a list of all existing transaction functions on the Sui Network. Functions are responsible for a particular piece of functionality contained in modules, which, in their turn, are deployed in packages.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method: from the lowest element to the highest (ASC) or from the highest element to the lowest (DESC).

parameters.name: searchStr
parameters.description: Enter part or full function name to get the queried function.

get.description: Get a list of all transaction modules on the Sui Network. Modules are segments of packages responsible for a particular piece of  functionality.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method: from the lowest element to the highest (ASC) or from the highest element to the lowest (DESC).

parameters.name: searchStr
parameters.description: Enter part or full module name to get the queried module.

post.description: Get a list of all transaction blocks. On Sui, transaction blocks are added in checkpoints and contain single transactions that execute atomic operations.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method: from the lowest element to the highest (ASC) or from the highest element to the lowest (DESC).

post.description: Get the total number of inscriptions on the Sui Network. Inscriptions are transactions which involve content (images, NFTs, text) embedded in Sui objects. Originated on Bitcoin (ordinals) inscriptions allow to significantly cut gas fees and store data directly within transactions without using an off-chain storage.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method: from the lowest element to the highest (ASC) or from the highest element to the lowest (DESC).

marketplace.description: The marketplace on which the queried inscriptions are traded.

get.description: Get details of a transaction block like project name, Url link, symbol, pool coin details, etc.

parameters.name: digest
parameters.description: Digest is an equivalent to a hash on the Sui Network.

schema.description: Digest is an equivalent to a hash on the Sui Network.

get.description: Get a list of all validators on the Sui Network.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method: from the lowest element to the highest (ASC) or from the highest element to the lowest (DESC).

parameters.name: searchStr
parameters.description: Enter part or full validator name or address to get the queried validator.

get.description: Get a chart showing the average APY (annual percentage yield) of all validators across the Sui Network. Average APY shows how much an account can earn on average per year by delegating Sui funds. This is a key metric to consider while making an investment decision. Avg APY is a rough estimation. The actual returns from staking may differ.

Get a chart showing the APY (annual percentage yield) of the queried validator. APY shows how much an account can earn per year by delegating Sui funds to the queried validator. This is a key metric to consider while making an investment decision. Avg APY is a rough estimation. The actual returns from staking may differ.
Get a chart showing the commission rate the queried validator charges from its delegators for staking services.

post.description: Get details of multiple validators addresses.

get.description: Get a chart showing the stake amount the queried validator has.
Get validator details by address.
Get a list of all delegations made to the queried validator.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method: from the lowest element to the highest (ASC) or from the highest element to the lowest (DESC).

parameters.name: searchStr
parameters.description: Enter part or full delegator address to get a list of its delegations.

get.description: Get a list of all accounts that delegated Sui funds to the queried validator.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method: from the lowest element to the highest (ASC) or from the highest element to the lowest (DESC).

parameters.name: searchStr
parameters.description: Enter part or full delegator address to get the queried delegator.

get.description: Check if the queried account is a validator.
Get a chart showing a list of validators in the active set for the selected period, i.e. validators that have over 30 mln Sui stake and participate in the Consensus.
Get a chart showing the average transaction fee throughout the Sui Network for the selected period.
Get a chart showing the average price for storing objects in the Sui storage for the selected period.

Get a chart showing the average storage rebate amount throughout the Sui Network for the selected period. Rebate is the compensation paid to object owners when such objects are deleted from the storage.
Get a chart showing top 5 collections sorted by the volume of trades of its NFTs.
Get a chart showing accounts that have been mentioned in any transaction for the selected period.
Get top 5 DeFi projects on Sui by volume in the last 24 hours. Powered by DefiLlama.
Get top 5 dex pairs by volume in the last 24 hours.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Period for which the data is shown.

schema.description: Period for which the data is shown.

get.description: Get a chart showing the current epoch data for the selected period: epoch start date, epoch time, latest checkpoint.
Get a chart showing Sui market data for the selected period, namely: Market Cap, Dominance, Supply, Circulating Supply, Total Stake. Powered by CoinGecko.
Get a chart showing the current price of the Sui coin in the USD denomination for the selected period. Powered by CoinGecko.
Top 5 Marketplaces listed by trade volume.
Get a chart showing the maximum transaction fee ever tracked on the Sui Network for the selected period.
Get a chart showing the minimum transaction fee ever tracked on the Sui Network for the selected period.
Get a chart showing the total number of accounts on the Sui Network for the selected period.
Get a chart showing the total number of checkpoints on the Sui Network for the selected period. Checkpoints are equivalents to blocks in Sui.
Get a chart showing the total number of coin denominations on the Sui Network for the selected period.
Get a chart showing the total number of NFTs on the Sui Network for the selected period.
Get a chart showing the total number of packages on the Sui Network for the selected period.Packages are smart contracts that execute custom logic.
Get a chart showing the total number of transaction blocks on the Sui Network for the selected period. On Sui, transaction blocks are added in checkpoints and contain smaller atomic transactions.

Get a chart showing the total number of transactions on the Sui Network for the selected period. On Sui, transactions are atomic units that execute a particular logic that are contained in transaction blocks.
Get a chart showing the blockchain throughput - transactions run on the Sui Network per second for the selected period.

Get a chart showing the total value locked of all coins on the Sui Network for the selected period. TVL aggregates all digital assets of a particular denomination locked with DeFis. Powered by DefiLlama.

marketplace.description: The marketplace on which the queried inscriptions are traded.
